name: TrumpTweetFactCheck
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: From the mind that brought you covfefe, the real Donald Trump. Stay up to late on his latest tweets and "alternative facts", subdued with a healthy dose of fact checking from Politifacts. Grab a strong drink and put your feet up!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
